Name: hin-muhammadfarooqk-la
Author: Muhammad Farooq Khan And Muhammad Ahmed

Translations.Text: saphal ho gae eemaanavaale
jo apanee namaazon mein vinamrata apanaate hai
aur jo vyarth baaton se pahaloo bachaate hai
aur jo zakaat ada karate hai
aur jo apane guptaangon kee raksha karate hai
sivaay is soorat ke ki apanee patni yon ya laundiyon ke paas jaen ki isapar ve nindaneey nahin hai
parantu jo koee isake atirikt kuchh aur chaahe to aise hee log seema ullanghan karanevaale hai.
aur jo apanee amaanaton aur apanee pratigya ka dhyaan rakhate hai
aur jo apanee namaazon kee raksha karate hain
vahee vaaris hone vaale hai
jo firadaus kee viraasat paenge. ve usamen sadaiv rahenge
hamane manushy ko mittee ke sat se banaaya
phir hamane use ek surakshit thaharane kee jagah tapakee huee boond banaakar rakha

phir hamane us boond ko lothade ka roop diya; phir hamane us lothade ko botee ka roop diya; phir hamane un haddiyon par maans chadhaaya; phir hamane use ek doosara hee sarjan roop dekar khada kiya. atah bahut hee barakatavaala hai allaah, sabase uttam srashta
phir tum avashy maranevaale ho
phir qiyaamat ke din tum nishchay hee uthae jaoge
aur hamane tumhaare oopar saat raaste banae hai. aur ham srshti-kaary se gaafil nahin
aur hamane aakaash se ek andaaze ke saath paanee utaara. phir hamane use dharatee mein thahara diya, aur use vilupt karane kee saamarthy bhee hamen praapt hai
phir hamane usake dvaara tumhaare lie khajooro aur angooron ke baag paida kie. tumhaare lie unamen bahut-se phal hai (jinamen tumhaare lie kitane hee laabh hai) aur unamen se tum khaate ho
aur vah vrksh bhee jo saina parvat se nikalata hai, jo tel aur khaanevaalon ke lie saalan lie hue ugata hai

aur nishchay hee tumhaare lie chaupaayon mein bhee ek shiksha hai. unake peton mein jo kuchh hai usamen se ham tumhen pilaate hai. aur tumhaare lie unamen bahut-se faayade hai aur unhen tum khaate bhee ho
aur unapar aur naukaon par tum savaar hote ho
hamane nooh ko usakee qaum kee or bheja to usane kaha, "ai meree qaum ke logo! allaah kee bandagee karo. usake siva tumhaara aur koee isht-poojy nahin hai to kya tum dar nahin rakhate

isapar unakee qaum ke saradaar, jinhonne inakaar kiya tha, kahane lage, "yah to bas tumheen jaisa ek manushy hai. chaahata hai ki tumapar shreshthata praapt kare.""allaah yadi chaahata to farishte utaar deta. yah baat to hamane apane agale baap-daada ke samayon se sunee hee nahin
yah to bas ek unmaadagrast vyakti hai. atah ek samay tak isakee prateeksha kar lo.
usane kaha, "ai mere rab! inhonne mujhe jo jhuthalaaya hai, isapar too meree sahaayata kar.

tab hamane usakee or prakaashana kee ki "hamaaree aankhon ke saamane aur hamaaree prakaashana ke anusaar nauka bana aur phir jab hamaara aadesh aa jae aur toofaan umad pade to pratyek prajaati mein se ek-ek joda usamen rakh le aur apane logon ko bhee, sivaay unake jinake viruddh pahale faisala ho chuka hai. aur atyaachaariyon ke vishay mein mujhase baat na karana. ve to doobakar rahenge
phir jab too nauka par savaar ho jae aur tere saathee bhee to kah, prashansa hai allaah kee, jisane hamen zaalim logon se chhutakaara diya
aur kah, ai mere rab! mujhe barakatavaalee jagah utaar. aur too sabase achchha mezabaan hai.
nissandeh isamen kitanee hee nishaaniyaan hain aur pareeksha to ham karate hee hai
phir unake pashchaat hamane ek doosaree nasl ko uthaaya
aur unamen hamane svayan unheen mein se ek rasool bheja ki "allaah kee bandagee karo. usake siva tumhaara koee isht-poojy nahin. to kya tum dar nahin rakhate

usakee qaum ke saradaar, jinhonne inakaar kiya aur aakhirat ke milan ko jhoothalaaya aur jinhen hamane saansaarik jeevan mein sukh pradaan kiya tha, kahane lage, "yah to bas tumheen jaisa ek manushy hai. jo kuchh tum khaate ho, vahee yah bhee khaata hai aur jo kuchh tum peete ho, vahee yah bhee peeta hai
yadi tum apane hee jaise ek manushy ke aagyaakaaree hue to nishchay hee tum ghaate mein pad gae
kya yah tumase vaada karata hai ki jab tum marakar mittee aur haddiyaan hokar rah jaoge to tum nikaale jaoge
door kee baat hai, bahut door kee, jisaka tumase vaada kiya ja raha hai
vah to bas hamaara saansaarik jeevan hee hai. (yaheen) ham marate aur jeete hai. ham koee dobaara uthae jaanevaale nahin hai
vah to bas ek aisa vyakti hai jisane allaah par jhooth ghada hai. ham use kadaapi maananevaale nahin.
usane kaha, "ai mere rab! unhonne jo mujhe jhuthalaaya, usapar too meree sahaayata kar.
kaha, "sheeghr hee ve pachhataakar rahenge.
phir ghatit honevaalee baat ke anusaar unhen ek prachand aavaaz ne aa liya aur hamane unhen kooda-karkat banaakar rakh diya. atah phitakaar hai, aise atyaachaaree logon par
phir hamane unake pashchaat doosaree naslon ko uthaaya
koee samudaay na to apane nirdhaarit samay se aage badh sakata hai aur na peechhe rah sakata hai

phir hamane nirantar apane rasool bheje. jab bhee kisee samudaay ke paas usaka rasool aaya, to usake logon ne use jhuthala diya. atah ham ek doosare ke peechhe (vinaash ke lie) lagaate chale gae aur hamane unhen aisa kar diya ki ve kahaaniyaan hokar rah gae. phitakaar ho un logon par jo eemaan na laen
phir hamane moosa aur usake bhaee haaroon ko apanee nishaaniyon aur khule pramaan ke saath firaun aur usake saradaaron kee or bheja.
kintu unhonne ahankaar kiya. ve the hee sarakash log
to va kahane lage, "kya ham apane hee jaise do manushyon kee baat maan len, jabaki unakee qaum hamaaree gulaam bhee hai
atah unhonne un donon ko jhuthala diya aur vinasht honevaalon mein sammilit hokar rahe
aur hamane moosa ko kitaab pradaan kee, taaki ve log maarg pa saken
aur marayam ke bete aur usakee maan ko hamane ek nishaanee banaaya. aur hamane unhen rahane yogy srotabaalee oonchee jagah sharan dee
ai paigambaro! achchhee paak cheeze khao aur achchha karm karo. jo kuchh tum karate ho use main jaanata hoon
aur nishchay hee yah tumhaara samudaay, ek hee samudaay hai aur main tumhaara rab hoon. atah mera dar rakho.
kintu unhonne svayan apane maamale (dharm) ko paraspar tukade-tukade kar daala. har giroh usee par khush hai, jo kuchh usake paas hai
achchha to unhen unakee apanee behoshee mein doobe hue hee ek samay tak chhod do
kya ve samajhate hai ki ham jo unakee dhan aur santaan se sahaayata kie ja rahe hai
to yah unake bhalaiyon mein koee jaldee kar rahe hai
nahin, balki unhen isaka ehasaas nahin hai. nishchay hee jo log apane rab ke bhay se kaanpate rahate hain
aur jo log apane rab kee aayaton par eemaan laate hai
aur jo log apane rab ke saath kisee ko saajhee nahin thaharaate
aur jo log dete hai, jo kuchh dete hai aur haal yah hota hai ki dil unake kaanp rahe hote hai, isalie ki unhen apane rab kee or palatana hai
yahee ve log hai, jo bhalaiyon mein jaldee karate hai aur yahee unake lie agrasar rahanevaale hai.
ham kisee vyakti par usakee samaee (kshamata) se badhakar zimmedaaree ka bojh nahin daalate aur hamaare paas ek kitaab hai, jo theek-theek bolatee hai, aur unapar zulm nahin kiya jaega

balki unake dil isakee (saty dharm kee) or se hatakar (vasavason aur gafalaton aadi ke) bhanvar mein pade hue hai aur usase (eemaanavaalon kee neeti se) hatakar unake kuchh aur hee kaam hai. ve unheen ko karate rahenge
yahaan tak ki jab ham unake khushahaal logon ko yaatana mein pakadege to kya dekhate hai ki ve vilaap aur fariyaad kar rahe hai
(kaha jaega,) "aaj chillao mat, tumhen hamaaree or se koee sahaayata milanevaalee nahin
tumhen meree aayaten sunaee jaatee theen, to tum apanee ediyon ke bal phir jaate the.
haal yah tha ki isake kaaran svayan ko bada samajhate the, use ek kahaanee kahanevaala thaharaakar chhod chalate the
kya unhonne is vaanee par vichaar nahin kiya ya unake paas vah cheez aa gaee jo unake pahale baap-daada ke paas na aaee thee
ya unhonne apane rasool ko pahachaana nahin, isalie usaka inakaar kar rahe hai
ya ve kahate hai, "use unmaad ho gaya hai." nahin, balki vah unake paas saty lekar aaya hai. kintu unamen adhikaansh ko saty apriy hai

aur yadi saty kaheen unakee ichchhaon ke peechhe chalata to samast aakaash aur dharatee aur jo bhee unamen hai, sabamen bigaad paida ho jaata. nahin, balki ham unake paas unake hisse kee anusmrti lae hai. kintu ve apanee anusmrti se katara rahe hai
ya tum unase kuth shulk maang rahe ho? tumhaare rab ka diya hee uttam hai. aur vah sabase achchhee rozee denevaala hai
aur vaastav mein tum unhen seedhe maarg kee or bula rahe ho
kintu jo log aakhirat par eemaan nahin rakhate ve is maarg se hatakar chalana chaahate hai
yadi ham (kisee aazamaish mein daalane ke pashchaat) unapar daya karate aur jis takaleef mein ve hote use door kar dete to bhee ve apanee sarakashee mein hathaat bahakate rahate
yadyapi hamane unhen yaatana mein pakada, phir bhee ve apane rab ke aage na to jhuke aur na ve gidagidaate hee the
yahaan tak ki jab ham unapar kathor yaatana ka dvaar khol den to kya dekhenge ki ve usamen niraash hokar rah gae hai
aur vahee hai jisane tumhaare lie kaan aur aankhe aur dil banae. tum krtagyata thode hee dikhaate ho
vahee hai jisane tumhen dharatee mein paida karake phailaaya aur usee kee or tum ikatthe hokar jaoge
aur vahee hai jo jeevan pradaan karata aur mrtyu deta hai aur raat aur din ka ulat-pher usee ke adhikaar mein hai. phir kya tum buddhi se kaam nahin lete
nahin, balki ve log vaheen kuchh karate hai jo unake pahale ke log kah chuke hai
unhonne kaha, "kya jab ham marakar mittee aur haddiyaan hokar rah jaenge , to kya hamen dobaara jeevit karake uthaaya jaega
yah vaada to hamase aur isase pahale hamaare baap-daada se hota aa raha hai. kuchh nahin, yah to bas agalon kee kahaaniyaan hai.
kaho, "yah dharatee aur jo bhee isamen aabaad hai, ve kisake hai, batao yadi tum jaanate ho
ve bol padege, "allaah ke!" kaho, "phir tum hosh mein kyon nahin aate
kaho, "saaton aakaashon ka maalik aur mahaan raajaasan ka svaameekaun hai
ve kahenge, "sab allaah ke hai." kaho, "phir dar kyon nahin rakhate
kaho, "har cheez kee baadashaahee kisake haath mein hai, vah jo sharan deta hai aur jisake muqaabale mein koee sharan nahin mil sakatee, batao yaji tum jaanate ho
ve bol padege, "allaah kee." kaho, "phir kahaan se tumapar jaadoo chal jaata hai
nahin, balki ham unake paas saty lekar aae hai aur nishchay hee ve jhoothe hai

allaah ne apana koee beta nahin banaaya aur na usake saath koee any poojy-prabhu hai. aisa hota to pratyek poojy-prabhu apanee srshti ko lekar alag ho jaata aur unamen se ek-doosare par chadhaee kar deta. mahaan aur uchch hai allaah un baaton se, jo ve bayaan karate hai
jaananevaala hai chhupe aur khule ka. so vah uchchatar hai vah shirk se jo ve karate hai
kaho, "ai mere rab! jis cheez ka vaada unase kiya ja raha hai, vah yadi too mujhe dikhae
to mere rab! mujhe un atyaachaaree logon mein sammilit na karana.
nishchay hee hamen isakee saamarthy praapt hai ki ham unase jo vaada kar rahe hai, vah tumhen dikha den.
buraee ko us dhang se door karo, jo sabase uttam ho. ham bhalee-bhaanti jaanate hai jo kuchh baaten ve banaate hai
aur kaho, "ai mere rab! main shaitaan kee ukasaahaton se teree sharan chaahata hoon
aur mere rab! main isase bhee teree sharan chaahata hoon ki ve mere paas aaen.
yahaan tak ki jab unamen se kisee kee mrtyu aa gaee to vah kahega, "ai mere rab! mujhe lauta de. - taaki jis (sansaar) ko main chhod aaya hoon
usamen achchha karm karoon." kuchh nahin, yah to bas ek (vyarth) baat hai jo vah kahega aur unake peechhe se lekar us din tak ek rok lagee huee hai, jab ve dobaara uthae jaenge
phir jab soor (narasingha) mein phoonk maaree jaegee to us din unake beech rishte-naate shesh na rahenge, aur na ve ek-doosare ko poochhenge
phir jinake palade bhaaree hue to vahee hain jo saphal.
rahe ve log jinake palade halke hue, to vahee hai jinhonne apane aapako ghaate mein daala. ve sadaiv jahannam mein rahenge
aag unake cheharon ko jhulasa degee aur usamen unake munh vikrt ho rahe honge
(kaha jaega,) "kya tumhen meree aayaaten sunaee nahin jaatee thee, to tum unhen jhuthalaate the
ve kahenge, "ai hamaare rab! hamaara durbhaagy hamapar prabhaavee hua aur ham bhatake hue log the
hamaare rab! hamen yahaan se nikaal de! phir ham dobaara aisa karen to nishchay hee ham atyaachaaree honge.
vah kahega, "phitakaare hue tiraskrt, isee mein pade raho aur mujhase baat na karo
mere bandon mein kuchh log the, jo kahate the, hamaare rab! ham eemaan le aae. atah too hamen kshama kar de aur hamapar daya kar. too sabase achchha daya karanevaala hai
to tumane unaka upahaas kiya, yahaan tak ki unake kaaran tum meree yaad ko bhula baithe aur tum unapar hansate rahe
aaj mainne unake dhairy ka yah badala pradaan kiya ki vahee hai jo saphalata ko praapt hue.
vah kahegaah “tum dharatee mein kitane varsh rahe”
vai kahengeh , "ek din ya ek din ka kuchh bhaag. ganana karanevaalon se poochh leejie.
vah kahega, "tum thahare thode hee, kya achchha hota tum jaanate hote
to kya tumane yah samajha tha ki hamane tumhen vyarth paida kiya hai aur yah ki tumhen hamaaree aur lautana nahin hai
to sarvochch hai allaah, sachcha samraat! usake siva koee poojy-prabhu nahin, svaamee hai mahimaashaalee sinhaasan ka

aur jo koee allaah ke saath kisee doosare poojy ko pukaare, jisake lie usake paas koee pramaam nahin, to bas usaka hisaab usake rab ke paas hai. nishchay hee inakaar karanevaale kabhee saphal nahin hoge
aur kaho, "mere rab! mujhe kshama kar de aur daya kar. too to sabase achchha daya karanevaala hai.
